files.content: import { Component } from '@angular/core' import { UbAvatarDirective, UbAvatarFallbackDirective, UbAvatarImageDirective } from '@/registry/new-york/ui/avatar' @Component({ standalone: true, selector: '[avatar-demo-new-york]', imports: [UbAvatarDirective, UbAvatarImageDirective, UbAvatarFallbackDirective], template: ` UB `, }) export default class AvatarDemoNewYork { }
